document.full_text: royal dutch shell  sees deep-water oil drilling continuing in the future and as of next year will produce more gas than oil, its chief executive was quoted as saying by a swiss newspaper on sunday.
document.title: shell ceo: deep-water drilling set to continue
lines_and_colors: royal dutch shell  sees deep-water oil drilling continuing in the future and as of next year will produce more gas than oil, its chief executive was quoted as saying by a swiss newspaper on sunday.
